name: La brava (Manami Aiba | My hero academia)
description:
DONT WORRY OFFICERS SHES 22 YEARS OLD

https://myheroacademia.fandom.com/wiki/Manami_Aiba

This is my first lora and I do appriciate any criticism about my method.

I recently watched mha again when I found out that no loras existed for Aiba so I decided to make one myself. By simply using the trigger words (la brava,red hair,twin tails) you can get her iconic shortstack design. Im still working on removing the need for more than one trigger word so please be patient. Most of her image avaible online have very extreme butt proportions and it can get a bit much though so lower the weights if necessary

Images shown were made in my model https://civitai.com/models/5245/kotosmix

Using https://huggingface.co/stabilityai/sd-vae-ft-mse-original/blob/main/vae-ft-mse-840000-ema-pruned.ckpt VAE

This model works best with abyssorange2hard

https://huggingface.co/WarriorMama777/OrangeMixs/blob/main/Models/AbyssOrangeMix2/AbyssOrangeMix2_hard.safetensors

To get her stylized look its best to use abyssorange. I accidently left my model on I will upload updated example images soon

Only SOME of the images have been upscaled.

Using hires. fix R-ESRGAN 4X+

upscaled by 1.5

upscale steps 40

denoise 0.55

Training information

1000 steps

18 images

20 repeats

3 batchsize

4 epochs

128 network_dim

128 network_alpha

1.5e-4 u-net_lr

5e-5 text_encoder_lr

512 resolution

cosine restart

4 restarts

trained on NAI

meta.prompt: ultra-detailed, masterpiece, highest quality,shiny skin,wet skin,glossy skin,(la brava:1.5),mini skirt,pleated skirt,white shirt,school uniform,twin tails,red hair, pink eyes,long hair,smile,open mouth fangs,beach <lora:labrava2:1>
meta.negativePrompt: (bad-artist:1.0), (loli:1.2), (worst quality, low quality:1.4), EasyNegative,  bad-hands-5,(monochrome:1.1), (greyscale),((((blurry background)))),orange shading,((((oversaturated,oversaturation)))),sunset,evening,(((glasses)))
